## UnformatTableColumn class

Represents an operation that unapplies a table column style

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class UnformatTableColumn extends UnformatTableColumnBase implements UnformatTableColumnProps 
```
**Extends:** UnformatTableColumnBase

**Implements:** [UnformatTableColumnProps](./scribing.unformattablecolumnprops.md)
